Things I've Made

These are some of the things I've made they include things like website tools, HTML Templates, and websites designs.

Pricing Calculator

A website pricing calculator that estimates the price of a website project based on few simple questions. How many pages does your website have? What level of design will you want for you website? how responsive do you want your website to be?

Figma Templates

A collection of Figma Templates I've Made over the last year. Feel free to download them.

Switching My Website Over From Jekyll to 11Ty

Part of the reason I moved over from Jekyll to 11ty was the Build time. While Jekyll is really good for smaller websites it starts falling on it's face as the website gets bigger

How I Got Started In Website Design

My interest with technology started when I received my first computer for Christmas at ten years old. When I wasn't taking it apart and putting it back together I was researching new ways to try and make it work faster and more efficiently. Fast forward a couple years and I started

Now that I'm 30 I've focused my attention to website development and design. While building websites these last few years I've developed a lot of technology related skills, theirs diffrent ways.

Below you'll find some of my projects including Website Templates, Website Designs and Tools I've been building over the past year.
